name: Forest Ent Concept Test [Untitled]
description:
MOVE:

  • W, A, S, D
  • Up, Down, Left, Right

Early concept test of a game idea I'm currently developing. In short the goal is to have a walking simulator style game with the focus on non verbal story. There should be a story there but not linearly scripted, instead it's implied through the visual communication from the environment. The game is to center around an ent protecting the forest and forest life from harm and daily obstacles.
